answers.answer: HiWelcome to the forum!If you have GERD, there is a possibility that you are tasting blood. Also in there is Vit C and Vit B deficiency, you could be having bleeding from gums. Ask your doctor regarding this. Also since you are on medications for so many things, you would need a combination of acid reducing agents to treat GERD. Please ask your doctor about adjusting your prescription for GERD accordingly. Also if you have diabetes, then this could be causing a fruity breath which you perceive as taste.Hope this helps. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!
